name: Gray Dawn
description: Embark on a terrifying adventure of a priest accused of murdering an altar boy. Gray Dawn is a psychological thriller infused with religious elements and combines story-driven quests with an artistic experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 / Radeon R9 280X Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7-3930K /AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / Radeon RX 580 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
